org.robolectric.shadows

Class ShadowView

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowView
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ShadowImageView, ShadowProgressBar, ShadowSurfaceView, ShadowTextView, ShadowViewGroup

    Shadow implementation of View that simulates the behavior of this class.

    Supports listeners, focusability (but not focus order), resource loading, visibility, onclick, tags, and tracks the size and shape of the view.

        public boolean checkedPerformClick()
        Utility method for clicking on views exposing testing scenarios that are not possible when using the actual app.
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the view is disabled or if the view or any of its parents are not visible.
